title: Stocks in the news: HCL Tech, Paytm, LTTS, ITC, Hind Zinc and ICICI Lombard - Economic Times
content: Stocks in the news: HCL Tech, Paytm, LTTS, ITC, Hind Zinc and ICICI Lombard  Economic Times
description: Hindustan Zinc, Sundaram Fasteners, MMTC, Tejas Networks, Tata Metaliks, Khaitan Chemicals, Wendt, Aditya Birla Money and Quest Capital are the companies that will announce their March quarter results today.
